thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Online lender On Deck's quarterly loss narrows

title: Online lender On Deck's quarterly loss narrows
text:
May 8, 2018 / 11:06 AM / Updated 18 minutes ago Online lender On Deck's quarterly loss narrows Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 8 (Reuters) - Online lender On Deck Capital Inc on Tuesday reported a smaller first-quarter loss, as it set aside less money for bad loans and lending rose.
Net loss attributable to common shareholders narrowed to $1.9 million, or 3 cents per share, in the quarter ended March 31, compared with a loss of $11.1 million, or 15 cents per share, a year earlier.
Net revenue rose to $42.2 million from $35.4 million. (Reporting by Nikhil Subba in Bengaluru; Editing by Shailesh Kuber)
